meanings.definition: Not fading or losing color over time.
meanings.sent1: The nonfading flowers in the garden stayed colorful all year.
meanings.sent2: Her nonfading dress looked as bright as the day she bought it.
meanings.sent3: The nonfading paint on the old house made it stand out in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: His nonfading enthusiasm for learning inspired his classmates.
meanings.sent5: The nonfading sunset painted the sky in beautiful hues.

meanings.definition: Remaining bright and vibrant without fading.
meanings.sent1: The nonfading stars twinkled in the clear night sky.
meanings.sent2: The nonfading memories of their childhood brought smiles to their faces.
meanings.sent3: The nonfading marker made the teacher's whiteboard drawings pop.
meanings.sent4: Her nonfading energy kept the team motivated throughout the game.
meanings.sent5: The nonfading rainbow arched gracefully across the sky.

meanings.sent1: The nonfading fabric of the flag waved proudly in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The nonfading artwork on the wall brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: The nonfading marker ink made the notes on the board easy to read.
meanings.sent4: His nonfading smile lit up the room wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: The nonfading leaves on the tree rustled gently in the breeze.
